flavorText:
"In the wake of the Kami War, Kamigawa descended into a state of constant warfare. Even with Kyodai's wisdom guiding them, it took the first Imperials decades of work and bloodshed to subdue the clans and bring peace to the land."
—*History of the Empire*

foreignData.flavorText:
„Als Folge des Kami-Krieges versank Kamigawa in einen Zustand andauernden Krieges. Obwohl Kyodais Weisheit sie leitete, kostete es die ersten kaiserlichen Truppen Jahrzehnte, um die Clans zu unterwerfen und dem Land Frieden zu bringen."
—*Geschichte des Kaiserreichs*
foreignData.name: Ära der kriegführenden Lande // Namenloser Eroberer

foreignData.flavorText:
"A raíz de la guerra con los kami, Kamigawa se sumió en un estado de guerra constante. Aun con la sabiduría de Kyodai guiándolos, a los primeros imperiales les llevó décadas de trabajo y derramamientos de sangre someter a los clanes para instaurar la paz en la región".
—*Historia del imperio*
foreignData.name: La era de los estados destrozados // Conquistador sin nombre

foreignData.flavorText:
« Au lendemain de la Guerre des kami, Kamigawa plongea dans un état de guerre permanente. Mêmes guidés par la sagesse de Kyodai, il fallut aux premiers Impériaux des décennies de travail et de sang versé pour soumettre les clans et apporter la paix au pays. »
—*Histoire de l'Empire*
foreignData.name: L'ère des états fracassés // Conquérant sans nom

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sulla scia della Guerra dei Kami, Kamigawa crollò in uno stato di conflitto perenne. Anche con la saggezza di Kyodai a guidarli, servirono decenni di sforzi e spargimenti di sangue perché i primi Imperiali sottomettessero i clan e riportassero la pace."
—*Storia dell'Impero*
foreignData.name: L'Era degli Stati Frammentati // Conquistatore Senza Nome

foreignData.flavorText:
「神の乱の勃発により、神河は絶え間ない戦乱の渦に巻き込まれていった。香醍の知恵の導きを以てさえも、最初の皇国軍が幾多の氏族を制圧し地に平和をもたらすまで、数十年にわたる努力と流血を要したのである。」
――*皇国の歴史*
foreignData.name: 戦乱時代 // 無名なる覇王
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — 人間・侍

foreignData.flavorText:
"카미 전쟁의 여파로, 카미가와는 끊임 없는 전쟁 상태로 전락해 버렸다. 쿄다이의 지혜가 그들을 인도했음에도 불구하고, 최초의 제국군이 부족들을 굴복시키고 이 땅에 평화를 가져온 것은 수십 년 동안 유혈사태가 벌어지고 난 후였다."
—*제국의 역사*
foreignData.name: 전국 시대 // 이름 없는 정복자

foreignData.flavorText:
"No rastro da Guerra dos Kami, Kamigawa caiu num estado de batalhas constantes. Mesmo com a sabedoria de Kyodai a guiá-los, passaram-se décadas de trabalho e derramamento de sangue até a subjugação dos clãs e o advento da paz."
— *História do Império*
foreignData.name: A Era dos Estados Despedaçados // Conquistador Sem Nome

foreignData.flavorText:
«После Войны Ками стычки в Камигаве не прекращались ни на день. И даже несмотря на то, что первых имперцев направляла мудрость Кёдай, им потребовались десятилетия работы и кровавой резни, чтобы покорить кланы и принести стране мир».
— *«История империи»*
foreignData.name: Эпоха Раздробленных Государств // Безымянный Завоеватель

foreignData.flavorText:
「逆神之战过后，神河仍深陷战争乱世。纵有香醍辅佐，始帝家亦经数十载惨烈战斗方才平定各方，令和平重回大地。」
～*《帝国通史》*
foreignData.name: 乱世风云录 // 无名风云儿

foreignData.flavorText:
「逆神之戰過後，神河仍深陷戰爭亂世。縱有香醍輔佐，始帝家亦經數十載慘烈戰鬥方才平定各方，令和平重回大地。」
～*《帝國通史》*
foreignData.name: 亂世風雲錄 // 無名風雲兒

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror

rulings.text: Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.
